content: striped dog snood xs- xxl sizes crochet pattern by sara sach please add this crochet pattern to your ravelry favorites ***free crochet pattern link *** https //poshpoochdesignsdogclothes blogspot com/2021/09/striped-dog-snood-with-pompoms-crochet html ***video link *** https //youtu be/mvippbt1v58 skill easy materials hook- i/ 5 500 mm yarn- worsted weight yarn 4 3 colors 1 oz of each color i used red heart super saver trim color c1 stripes c2 c3 tape measure stitches chain chain half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet front post double_crochet fpdc aprox sizes -xs- xxl please do not copy or redistribute this pattern
